site_name: CHARLES Mc GINNIS & DEBBI Mc GINNIS

citations.narrative:
In the whelping building, there was excessive dirt and grime on the outside of the doggie doors for an enclosure housing
an adult Weimaraner and an enclosure housing an adult Dachshund and her 4 puppies. Dirt and grime can harbor
organisms that can affect the health of the dogs. The licensee must ensure that cleaning and sanitization are done as
frequently as necessary to prevent soiling of the dogs and to reduce disease hazards.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.1(c)(3)  Repeat
   
Housing facilities, general. 
In the whelping building, there was excessive dirt and grime on the outside of the doggie doors for an enclosure housing 
an adult Weimaraner and an enclosure housing an adult Dachshund and her 4 puppies. Dirt and grime can harbor 
organisms that can affect the health of the dogs. The licensee must ensure that cleaning and sanitization are done as 
frequently as necessary to prevent soiling of the dogs and to reduce disease hazards. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
